title: Ticket #2201: CREAM resource names containing a dash are mishandled
description:
If the name of a CREAM service contains an extra dash, condor_submit parses it incorrectly and the job can't be submitted properly. The CREAM server will return an error, causing to the job to become held.

Example CREAM resource name that causes a problem: https://grid-test-60.trigrid.it:8443/cream-condor-grid-test-60.trigrid.it

Condor_submit turns it into this GridResource value: cream https://grid-test-60.trigrid.it:8443/ce-cream/services/CREAM2 condor grid test 60.trigrid.it

The gridmanager ignores 'test 60.trigrid.it' and sets QueueName to 'grid' instead of 'grid-test-60.trigrid.it' in the CREAM JDL.
remarks:
2011-Jun-01 14:37:18 by jfrey:
Pushed a fix to V7_6-branch for 7.6.2.
